text: oh inu anthu akhulupirira! Pewani kukaikirana chifukwa kukhala ndi chikayiko ndi tchimo. Ndipo musachite ukazitape pakati panu kapena amiseche. Kodi wina wa inu angakondwere kudya mnofu wa mnzake amene ndi wakufa? Kodi koma inu mumakana kudya.. Kotero opani Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu amabwezera chisoni chifukwa ndiye Mwini Chisoni Chosatha
